statements: SELECT * FROM robotic_surgical_systems_usage_statistics;
SELECT system_id, total_usage_hours FROM robotic_surgical_systems_usage_statistics;
SELECT * FROM robotic_surgical_systems_usage_statistics ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT system_id, total_usage_hours FROM robotic_surgical_systems_usage_statistics WHERE total_usage_hours > 500;
SELECT system_id, last_maintenance_date FROM robotic_surgical_systems_usage_statistics WHERE maintenance_frequency = 4;
SELECT system_id, total_usage_hours FROM robotic_surgical_systems_usage_statistics WHERE maintenance_frequency > 100 ORDER BY total_usage_hours DESC;
SELECT * FROM robotic_surgical_systems_usage_statistics WHERE last_maintenance_date < '2022-01-01' AND maintenance_frequency < 50;
SELECT system_id, last_maintenance_date, total_usage_hours FROM robotic_surgical_systems_usage_statistics WHERE total_usage_hours BETWEEN 500 AND 800 ORDER BY last_maintenance_date;
SELECT system_id, total_usage_hours, maintenance_frequency FROM robotic_surgical_systems_usage_statistics WHERE total_usage_hours > 1000 AND maintenance_frequency < 30 ORDER BY system_id ASC;
SELECT system_id, last_maintenance_date, maintenance_frequency FROM robotic_surgical_systems_usage_statistics WHERE last_maintenance_date BETWEEN '2021-06-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM usage_statistics_of_robotic_surgical_systems;
SELECT patient_id, cost FROM usage_statistics_of_robotic_surgical_systems ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT surgeon_id, operation_date FROM usage_statistics_of_robotic_surgical_systems WHERE duration < 60;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_planning_and_optimization WHERE cost > 5000 ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT maintenance_id, maintenance_type FROM maintenance_planning_and_optimization WHERE completed = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM usage_statistics_of_robotic_surgical_systems WHERE duration > 120 ORDER BY operation_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT patient_id, surgeon_id, COUNT(*) as operations_count FROM usage_statistics_of_robotic_surgical_systems GROUP BY patient_id, surgeon_id HAVING operations_count > 3 ORDER BY patient_id, surgeon_id;
SELECT maintenance_id, robot_id, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_planning_and_optimization WHERE completed = FALSE AND cost > 1000 ORDER BY maintenance_date LIMIT 5;
SELECT surgeon_id, AVG(cost) as avg_cost FROM usage_statistics_of_robotic_surgical_systems GROUP BY surgeon_id ORDER BY avg_cost DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT operation_date, SUM(cost) as total_cost FROM usage_statistics_of_robotic_surgical_systems GROUP BY operation_date HAVING total_cost > 50000 ORDER BY total_cost DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM robotic_surgical_systems;
SELECT system_id, manufacturer, model FROM robotic_surgical_systems WHERE usage_hours > 1000;
SELECT model, manufacturer FROM robotic_surgical_systems ORDER BY manufacturer ASC;
SELECT system_id, last_maintenance_date FROM robotic_surgical_systems WHERE system_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE scheduled_maintenance_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT manufacturer, model, usage_hours FROM robotic_surgical_systems WHERE model LIKE 'Da Vinci%'
SELECT DISTINCT manufacturer FROM robotic_surgical_systems ORDER BY manufacturer DESC
SELECT model, usage_hours FROM robotic_surgical_systems WHERE usage_hours > 1000 AND last_maintenance_date < '2022-01-01'
SELECT system_id, manufacturer, last_maintenance_date FROM robotic_surgical_systems JOIN maintenance_history ON robotic_surgical_systems.system_id = maintenance_history.system_id
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE scheduled_maintenance_type = 'Calibration' ORDER BY scheduled_maintenance_date ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM robot_models;
SELECT robot_id, model_name, manufacturer FROM robot_models WHERE production_year > 2010;
SELECT model_name, manufacturer FROM robot_models ORDER BY model_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_type = 'Scheduled Maintenance';
SELECT maintenance_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_type FROM maintenance_records ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT model_name, manufacturer, production_year FROM robot_models WHERE production_year > 2015
SELECT robot_id, model_name, manufacturer, production_year FROM robot_models WHERE manufacturer = 'SpaceX'
SELECT maintenance_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_type FROM maintenance_records ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_type = 'Scheduled Maintenance' AND maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT m.maintenance_id, m.maintenance_date, m.maintenance_type, mp.description FROM maintenance_records m JOIN maintenance_plans mp ON m.maintenance_type = mp.maintenance_type
SELECT * FROM Robot_Models;
SELECT surgeon_name, specialty FROM Surgeon_Statistics WHERE experience_years > 5;
SELECT procedure_name, complexity_level FROM Surgical_Procedures ORDER BY complexity_level DESC;
SELECT log_id, maintenance_date, technician_id FROM Maintenance_Log WHERE maintenance_type = 'Scheduled';
SELECT surgeon_name, specialty, experience_years FROM Surgeon_Statistics WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT model_name, manufacturer FROM Robot_Models WHERE year_of_manufacture > 2010;
SELECT procedure_name, equipment_used FROM Surgical_Procedures WHERE complexity_level > 3 ORDER BY procedure_name DESC;
SELECT surgeon_name, specialty, experience_years FROM Surgeon_Statistics WHERE experience_years >= 10 AND specialty = 'Neurosurgery';
SELECT maintenance_date, maintenance_type, technician_id FROM Maintenance_Log ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;

SELECT surgeon_name, start_time, end_time, model_name FROM Surgeon_Statistics JOIN Usage_Statistics ON Surgeon_Statistics.surgeon_id = Usage_Statistics.surgeon_id JOIN Robot_Models ON Usage_Statistics.robot_model_id = Robot_Models.model_id WHERE start_time BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-07-01';
